meanings.definition: A piece of furniture used for storing clothes.
meanings.sent1: My mom keeps all her dresses neatly folded in the clothespress.
meanings.sent2: The clothespress in the bedroom is filled with shirts and pants.
meanings.sent3: When the clothespress gets too full, it looks like a colorful mountain.
meanings.sent4: Her overflowing clothespress was a treasure trove of fashion.
meanings.sent5: The old wooden clothespress smelled like lavender and memories.

meanings.definition: To press or smooth clothes using a clothespress.
meanings.sent1: She carefully clothespresses her uniform every morning before school.
meanings.sent2: I need to clothespress this shirt before the party tonight.
meanings.sent3: He clothespresses his clothes with such precision, they look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The laundry service clothespressed all my shirts to perfection.
meanings.sent5: Watching her clothespress the wrinkles away was like magic to me.
